title: Driver Data Is a Help and a Hazard for Auto Insurers
sub_head: Auto insurers will need to partner with digitally savvy startups as the explosive growth of vehicle data empowers new competitors
body:
T
Real-world driving data from connected cars is both a treasure trove and a minefield for auto insurers. Big banksâ€™ efforts to deal with financial technology challengers offer some useful lessons.
The volume of so-called telematic driving data, whether from mobile phone apps, dongles, in-car sensors or aftermarket blackboxes, is ballooning....
